mapper.select: SELECT F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(d.SUN_YMD,'Y-M-D') as sunYmd , d.DAY_NM as dayNm , d.NOTE as note , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(d.MOON_YMD,'Y-M-D') as moonYmd , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(h.HOLIDAY_YMD,'Y-M-D') as holidayYmd , h.HOLIDAY_NM as holidayNm FROM WTM_DAY_MGR d JOIN WTM_HOLIDAY_MGR h ON 'Y' = ( CASE WHEN h.SUN_YN = 'Y' AND d.SUN_YMD = h.HOLIDAY_YMD THEN 'Y' WHEN h.SUN_YN = 'N' AND d.MOON_YMD = h.HOLIDAY_YMD THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) WHERE (h.TENANT_ID IS NULL OR h.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}) AND (#{enterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR h.ENTER_CD IS NULL OR h.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND (#{bisinessPlaceCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR h.BISINESS_PLACE_CD IS NULL OR h.BISINESS_PLACE_CD = #{bisinessPlaceCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND SUBSTR(SUN_YMD,1,6) = #{ym} ORDER BY d.SUN_YMD
select info_key , info_name , info_data from comm_management_infomation where tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT A.YMD as ymd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.YMD, 'Y.M.D') as ymds, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'YMDHI') as entrySdate, CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), '')) as entryDate, A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD as entryStypeCd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'YMDHI') as entryEdate, A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD as entryEtypeCd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'YMDHI') as planSdate, CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), '')) as planDate, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'YMDHI') as planEdate, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as flexibleNm, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as timeNm, M.TODAY_PLAN_EDIT_YN, CASE WHEN M.WORK_SHM IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(M.WORK_SHM, 2), ':',RIGHT(M.WORK_SHM, 2),' ~ ', LEFT(M.WORK_EHM, 2), ':',RIGHT(M.WORK_EHM, 2)) END as workDate, CASE WHEN M.CORE_SHM IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(M.CORE_SHM, 2), ':',RIGHT(M.CORE_SHM, 2),' ~ ', LEFT(M.CORE_EHM, 2), ':',RIGHT(M.CORE_EHM, 2)) END as coreDate, M.WORK_SHM AS workShm, M.WORK_EHM AS workEhm, M.CORE_SHM AS coreShm, M.CORE_EHM AS coreEhm, A.HOLIDAY_YN AS holidayYn, E.FLEXIBLE_EMP_ID AS flexibleEmpId, M.WORK_TYPE_CD AS workTypeCd, CASE WHEN #{ymd} > F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(now(), 'YMD') THEN 'Y' WHEN #{ymd} = F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(now(), 'YMD') AND M.TODAY_PLAN_EDIT_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as editYn , IFNULL(A.WORK_CLOSE_YN, 'N') as closeYn FROM WTM_WORK_CALENDAR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_FLEXIBLE_EMP E ON E.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND E.ENTER_CD = A.ENTER_CD AND E.SABUN = A.SABUN AND #{ymd} BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR M ON M.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID = E.FLEXIBLE_STD_MGR_ID WHERE A.YMD = #{ymd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} GROUP BY A.YMD

SELECT A.YMD as ymd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.YMD, 'Y.M.D') as ymds, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'YMDHI') as entrySdate, CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_SDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'Y.M.D H:I'), '')) as entryDate, A.ENTRY_STYPE_CD as entryStypeCd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(A.ENTRY_EDATE, 'YMDHI') as entryEdate, A.ENTRY_ETYPE_CD as entryEtypeCd, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'YMDHI') as planSdate, CONCAT(IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(B.PLAN_SDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), ''), ' ~ ', IFNULL(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), '')) as planDate, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MAX(B.PLAN_EDATE), 'YMDHI') as planEdate, F_WTM_GET_FLEXIBLE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as flexibleNm, F_WTM_GET_TIME_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.YMD) as timeNm , IFNULL(A.WORK_CLOSE_YN, 'N') as closeYn FROM WTM_WORK_CALENDAR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN WHERE A.YMD = #{ymd} AND A.SABUN = #{sabun} AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} GROUP BY A.YMD

SELECT CONCAT(E.EMP_NM, '(', E.SABUN, ')') as emp, E.SABUN as sabun, CONCAT(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(A.PLAN_SDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I'), ' ~ ', F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(MIN(A.PLAN_EDATE), 'Y.M.D H:I')) as plan, CASE WHEN GROUP_CONCAT(D.TAA_NM) IS NULL AND B.HOLIDAY_YN ='Y' THEN '휴일' WHEN GROUP_CONCAT(D.TAA_NM) IS NULL AND B.HOLIDAY_YN ='N' THEN '정상근무' ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(D.TAA_NM) END AS status FROM WTM_WORK_DAY_RESULT A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS E ON E.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = E.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = E.SABUN AND F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(now(), 'YMD') BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD INNER JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR B ON A.YMD = B.YMD AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN LEFT JOIN WTM_TAA_CODE D ON A.TAA_CD = D.TAA_CD AND D.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND D.ENTER_CD = A.ENTER_CD WHERE A.YMD = REPLACE(#{ymd}, '.', '') AND (A.SABUN like CONCAT('%', #{sabun}, '%') OR E.EMP_NM like CONCAT('%', #{sabun}, '%')) AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} GROUP BY A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.YMD, A.SABUN
